David Burtka Finance Overview

Acting Career and Earnings

David Burtka has built a substantial part of his wealth through his acting career. He made his Broadway debut in the revival of Gypsy, which starred Bernadette Peters.

This performance earned him recognition and awards, such as the Clarence Derwent Award.

He also played notable roles in TV shows like The West Wing and How I Met Your Mother, contributing significantly to his income.

Real Estate Investments

Real estate has been a crucial aspect of Burtka’s financial portfolio.

In 2010, he and Neil Patrick Harris purchased a sprawling estate in Sherman Oaks, California, for $2.1 million and sold it for $3 million in 2014.

In 2013, they acquired a Central Harlem townhouse for $3.6 million.

Their most luxurious purchase was the East Hampton mansion bought in 2018 for $5.5 million, featuring a variety of high-end amenities.

Culinary Ventures and Contributions

Transitioning from acting, Burtka pursued a career in the culinary arts.

He trained at Le Cordon Bleu, leading to the establishment of his catering company, Gourmet M.D.

His culinary skills were further showcased with the publication of his cookbook, Life is a Party, in 2019.

These ventures have not only diversified his income but also reinforced his brand as a multifaceted entertainer.

Box Office and Video Sales

Burtka’s involvement in films also contributes to his financial standing.

His role in A Very Harold & Kumar 3D Christmas resulted in impressive box office sales of $36.27 million globally in 2011, with additional video sales amounting to $11.38 million in 2012.

In 2014, the video sales of Dance-Off, where he played JT, added $30,400 to his earnings.

Other Income Sources

In addition to his primary income streams, Burtka may have additional revenue from guest appearances, public speaking engagements, and brand endorsements, though specific figures are not available.

Personal Life and Its Influence on Wealth

Burtka’s marriage to Neil Patrick Harris has significantly influenced his public image and opportunities.

The couple’s media coverage and high-profile lifestyle have brought additional attention to Burtka’s professional ventures, indirectly contributing to his financial success.

FAQs about David Burtka

Who is David Burtka?

He is an American actor and professional chef, known for his roles on TV and Broadway, as well as his culinary skills. He is also the husband of Neil Patrick Harris.

What are his notable acting roles?

He is known for his role in How I Met Your Mother as Scooter, and on Broadway in Gypsy and The Play About the Baby.

What is his background in culinary arts?

He is a trained chef, having graduated from Le Cordon Bleu College of Culinary Arts Pasadena. He runs a catering company and authored the cookbook Life is a Party.

How did he and Neil Patrick Harris meet?

They met through mutual friends in New York City in 2004. They got engaged in 2011 and married in Italy in 2014.

What awards has he won?

He is well-regarded in the entertainment industry but has not won any major individual awards.

Does he have children?

Yes, he and Neil Patrick Harris have fraternal twins, Harper Grace and Gideon Scott, born via surrogacy in 2010.

What other ventures is he involved in?

He is involved in philanthropy, supporting charities related to the LGBTQ+ community and children’s health.

What is his educational background?

He earned a Bachelor of Fine Arts from the University of Michigan and studied culinary arts at Le Cordon Bleu College of Culinary Arts Pasadena.
